title: 微软WIN10系统2016年重大更新被命名为“Redstone“
author: 乙烯_中国
txt_content:
本帖最后由 乙烯_中国 于 2015-4-8 19:47 编辑 

       本人渣翻译，各位见谅。文章来源neowin网。
       感觉怎么说，这篇新闻都和MC擦边，于是我就翻译了一下。




       今天的早些时候，我们获悉了有关微软的下一次windows更新的第一手资料，该次更新代号为红石。在此之后，更多的细节被披露。我们的信息来源对此次针对性更新发表了一些看法。
       红石更新将分为两个阶段，第一阶段计划到2016年6月，第二阶段定于10月。正如我们之前的报道，这些阶段将在对外公布前进行内部测试。
       红石更新的特性我们尚未得知，因为它们涉及到即将发布的win10的特性。从RTM削减的特性将会被推延到红石中。
       由于这些日期都在一年之外，所以计划可能会变化，也有跳票的可能，但这确实给我们提供了一个期望的日期，让我们知道大概什么时候可以将更新安装到电脑里。
       在win10还没有出RTM版的时候讨论红石更新或许显得有点疯狂。这是因为操作系统的大部分功能已经被锁定而整个公司开始转为只为操作系统debug的模式。这就是说，不会影响RTM版的期限的特性将会被放到下次更新中，而这次的更新就是我们所知的红石更新。
       一旦今年夏天win10确定RTM版本后，红石所将增加的部分或许将会更清楚。
       
原文

Earlier today, we uncovered the first details about Microsoft's next Windows update, codenamed Redstone. Since then, more details have been surfacing and now one of our sources has chimed in with the targeted release dates.Redstone will come in two waves, the first wave is targeted to arrive in June of 2016 and the second wave is scheduled for October of the same year. As we previously reported, these waves will be trialed with Windows Insiders ahead of their release to the general population.The features in Redstone are still unknown as they relate to the upcoming release of Windows 10; features that get cut from the RTM will be pushed to the Redstone release.With these release dates still over a year away, they are subject to change and could slip, but they do provide us with a target of when to expect the updates to land on your machine.If all this talk of Redstone seems a bit crazy since Windows 10 has still not hit RTM yet, it's because most of the features for the OS have been locked down and the company is moving towards a bug-fix only mode. This means that features that will not hit the RTM deadline get pushed to the next wave of release which we now know is Redstone.What Redstone will include should become more visible sometime this summer once Windows 10 has hit RTM.


译者观点
将来我们可以在红石系统里玩mc了，感觉怪怪的23333。微软下的一手好棋。

原文地址：http://www.neowin.net/news/windows-redstone-will-come-in-two-waves-june-and-october-2016
